mapper.insert: insert into video (course_id, session, url, title, description, score) values (#{course_id}, #{session}, #{url}, #{title}, #{description}, #{score});
insert into stu_session_score (stu_id, sess_id, video_score, test_score) values (#{user}, #{sess_id}, 0, 0);
insert into session_test (session_id, question_type, title, choices, correct_answer) values (#{session_id}, #{questionType}, #{title}, #{choices}, #{correct_answer});
mapper.select: select stu_session_score.id as id, stu_id, sess_id, video_score, test_score from stu_session_score join (select id from video where course_id = #{course_id}) as table_1 on sess_id = table_1.id where stu_id = #{student_id}
